attributes.action: Forbid the granting of a state funeral to Baroness Thatcher.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Those that sign this petition wish it to be known to the Prime Minister that we will not in any manner support the veneration of such a detested public figure. We, the people of England and undersigned, wish to make it clear that to provide a state funeral to the leader that supported the MI5 training of Ossama Bin-Laden and other terrorists, supported the regime of Pinochet, implimented the disasterous theory of trickledown economics which has led to the culture of credit and the current economic crisis in the UK (amongst many other offences) would be both hypocritical and hateful. We demand the withdrawal of this honour.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
